<h1 align="center">
  Adventist Bible Study Guide Kinyarwanda Version
</h1>

![Vercel](https://vercelbadge.vercel.app/api/shyakadev/ibyigisho-revised-version) <br/>

Welcome to the GatsbyJS Adventist Bible Study Guide project! This repository contains the Kinyarwanda version of the Adventist Bible Study Guide, accompanied by a convenient popup modal feature for reading Bible verses.

## Features
* **Popup Modal for Bible Verses**: Each Bible verse within the guide is equipped with a popup modal feature. When clicked, the verse is displayed in a modal, making it easy for users to read and reference the specific scripture.

## Demo
Check out the live demo of the Adventist Bible Studies Guide in Kinyarwanda [here](https://www.ibyigisho.xyz/). 

## Installation
To run this project locally, follow these steps:

1. Clone the repository: git clone https://github.com/shyakadev/ibyigisho-revised-version.git
2. Navigate to the project directory: cd ibyigisho-revised-version
3. Install dependencies: npm install
4. Start the development server: npm run develop
5. Open your browser and visit: http://localhost:8000

## Usage
Once the project is set up locally or deployed to a web server, users can access the Adventist Bible Study Guide in Kinyarwanda. They can navigate through the different Bible study topics and click on any verse to read it in the popup modal. The guide provides a structured and comprehensive resource for studying the Bible from an Adventist perspective.

## Contributing
Contributions to this project are welcome! If you would like to contribute, please follow these guidelines:

## Fork the repository.
Create a new branch for your contribution: git checkout -b my-contribution
Make your changes and commit them: git commit -am 'Add my contribution'
Push the changes to your branch: git push origin my-contribution
Submit a pull request, explaining your changes and their purpose.
